Text:
you're welcome PiratusLongus. also, Spawn #1-228 + almost 200 specials, miniseries:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8323529/
and Spawn #229:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8263172/

The Batman cover this is based on was my first comic ever.  This brings back memories.  Thank you STFmaryville.

Since you've been so awesome uploading Image comics, do you have Youngblood 77?  Thanks.
did you get it in one of those 3-pack comics that were sold at drug stores and odd places that didn't usually have new comics? if so, i think i did, too!
and i can't find youngblood 77. it's entirely possible that it still hasn't been scanned. i'll keep an eye out for it.

No, actually I got it at a grocery store rack back when I was really young.  I was into the Super Powers action figures and Batman was my favorite.  When I saw it at the grocery store I asked my mom and she bought it for me.  Little did I know what that would cause...

As to Youngblood 77, thanks for keeping an eye out.
Thanks STFmaryville! Could you give me some advice on anonymity for uploading torrents I was gonna upload some higher quality scans than some on here ex. Venom, etc but it seems a little scary :c.

CbrBro, i'm not very concerned with my own anonymity. my philosophy is that if someone really wants to find me, they'll find me.

however, a lot of people who upload torrents here on TPB just check the box marked "Anonymous" and that changes the "By:" field on a page to not show your user ID (like this one, scroll to the top & you'll see "By: STFmaryville").

you can always check the forums for more info, and discuss it with people with much more technical knowledge than i have. a good thread i found in this vein was: 

https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=127340
